name: Information Output Handling And Retention
description: The organization handles and retains output from the information system in accordance with applicable laws, Executive Orders, directives, policies, regulations, standards, and operational requirements.\n

rev5.name: Information Management and Retention
rev5.changes_from_rev4: Title changed from 'Information Handling and Retention' Control text changes 'information handling' to 'information management' and changes the wording of the list of 'in accordance with' specifics Discussion adds recommendation to coordinate with records management personnel and references numerous other controls Incorporates data retention elements of withdrawn App J control DM-2
